p: Finally, providing protective gear and preventive policies for the healthcare workforce — among those at greatest risk for SARS-CoV-2 infection — has lagged behind the rapidly rising numbers of cases of COVID-19 cases and raised the stress levels of healthcare workers [ 37]. Delays in production and deployment of life-saving equipment for patients and care providers have been influenced by political and economic priorities well-beyond the patient-provider interface and the institutions where these activities occur [ 38– 40].
